Families struggling as Bay of Plenty overtakes Auckland as priciest region in the country https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/families-struggling-as-bay-of-plenty-overtakes-auckland-as-priciest-region-in-the-country/ CJMF5CYGBFET7FBPOATO5JXX4E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/families-struggling-as-bay-of-plenty-overtakes-auckland-as-priciest-region-in-the-country/ CJMF5CYGBFET7FBPOATO5JXX4E/ “Scary and painful” to pack up a house without know where you are moving to. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 22:01:59 +0000 Kaysi Fredericks and her husband, Sam, have applied for more than100 rentals. They need a place that is wheelchair and pet friendly. Pictured top L-R: Kaysi, Codi (16). Bottom L-R: Renesmae (10), Arabella (12) and Aram (14). Absent: Sam Fredericks. 31 January 2024 Bay of Plenty Times Photo / Alex Cairns
